name: magicdock
description: A macOS-style dock with magnification effect and tooltip variants

props.name: items
props.description: Array of dock items to render

props.name: className
props.description: Additional CSS classes for the dock container

props.name: distance
props.description: Mouse distance threshold for magnification effect in pixels

props.name: panelHeight
props.description: Height of the dock panel in pixels

props.name: baseItemSize
props.description: Default size of each dock item in pixels

props.name: dockHeight
props.description: Maximum height of the dock when expanded in pixels

props.name: magnification
props.description: Maximum size of a dock item when magnified in pixels

props.name: spring
props.description: Spring physics configuration for the magnification animation
